      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      EnemyModel Factory.makeIntEnemy(int enemyInt)
      Returns an instance of an enemy corresponding to the passed in string.
      EnemyModel GameModel.spawnEnemy()

      Methods in main that return types with arguments of type EnemyModel 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.ArrayList<EnemyModel> GameModel.getEnemyList() 
      Methods in main with parameters of type EnemyModel 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean GameModel.damageEnemy(int towerInd, EnemyModel em)
      Adds damage to the current object that is on the game given a Tower index from the arrayList of Towers and an EnemyModel.
      boolean GameModel.isInRange(int towerInd, EnemyModel em)
      Checks the range of the tower versus the enemy, if it is range it returns true If it is not in range it returns false.
      boolean GameModel.isOutOfBounds(EnemyModel enemyUnit)
      Gets the position index of an EnemyModel and returns true if the enemy at the given index in this game's enemyList has reached the end of the path, or returns false otherwise
      void GameModel.moveEnemy(EnemyModel enemyUnit)
      Moves the enemy at the given index in this game's enemyList toward the next destination in the path, And, if the enemy reaches the destination, returns true if the enemy falls out of bounds, And returns false, while updating its direction, if it does not
      Method parameters in main with type arguments of type EnemyModel
